patterns: What can I study in engineering?
responses: Engineering has several specializations, including Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, and Computer Engineering. Some courses include Structural Analysis, Thermodynamics, Circuit Analysis, and Digital Logic Design.

patterns: What can I study in business?
responses: Business studies include specializations such as Marketing, Finance, Management, and Accounting. Some courses include Consumer Behavior, Corporate Finance, Organizational Behavior, and Financial Accounting.

patterns: What can I study in medicine?
responses: Medicine has specializations like Cardiology, Neurology, Pediatrics, and Surgery. Some courses include Cardiac Physiology, Neuroanatomy, Pediatric Medicine, and General Surgery.

patterns: What can I study in science?
responses: Science studies include specializations such as Physics, Chemistry, Biology, and Mathematics. Some courses include Classical Mechanics, Organic Chemistry, Cell Biology, and Calculus.

patterns: Different fields of Arts and Humanities
Types of Arts and Humanities studies
What can I study in Arts and Humanities?
responses: Arts and Humanities include specializations like Literature, History, Philosophy, and Visual Arts. Some courses include English Literature, Ancient History, Ethics, and Drawing.

There are four main blood types: A, B, AB, and O. Blood type compatibility is as follows: A can receive from A and O, B can receive from B and O, AB can receive from A, B, AB, and O, and O can receive from O. Type O is the universal donor.
